description:
SISU 2: Road to Revenge – Official Trailer (2025)

💥 SISU 2: Road to Revenge – Official Trailer (2025) | New Action Movies 4K
The man who refuses to die is back. Sisu 2 follows Aatami Korpi on a relentless path of vengeance where no enemy, no obstacle, and no bullet can stop him.

🔎 Film Overview
After the destruction of his home and family, Aatami sets off on a brutal road of retribution. Hunted by enemies old and new, he turns every encounter into a fight for survival, proving once again why he’s unstoppable.

⚡ What to Expect

Visceral hand-to-hand combat and inventive kills

WWII survival grit blended with road-chase action

Stark visuals and bone-crunching violence in 4K HDR

A raw, stripped-down revenge story

⭐ Cast
Jorma Tommila as Aatami Korpi
Stephen Lang
Richard Brake

🎬 Directed by Jalmari Helander
📆 Release Date: Fall 2025
🎞️ Genre: Action | Thriller | Revenge

👇 Would you stand against an army for vengeance?
#Sisu2 #RoadToRevenge #ActionMovies2025 #OfficialTrailer #4KAct
